This is clear evidence for Lyell’s geologic theory.

Now I see.

To prepare for its next long survey mission, the Beagle returned to the port of Valparaiso.

Wonderful, now

I’ll have the chance

to properly explore

the Andes

Mountains.

Before setting off, Darwin enlisted the help of a native guide to more thoroughly investigate

the Andes Mountains.

Over there is the tallest peak of the Andes Mountains.

Just as

I thought! There

are shell fossils even at the mountain peaks.

It’s clear now that

the earth’s topography constantly changes,

and that the earth

has a history spanning

millions of years.

112
